destinations.name: Paris, France
destinations.description: Discover the romantic charm of the City of Lights. Visit the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and stroll along the Seine River.
destinations.weather: Mild to cool climate, with warm summers and chilly winters.
destinations.safetyTips: Beware of pickpockets in crowded tourist areas. Keep your belongings secure.

destinations.name: Bali, Indonesia
destinations.description: Experience the exotic beauty of Bali. Relax on stunning beaches, explore ancient temples, and enjoy the vibrant culture.
destinations.weather: Tropical climate, with warm and humid weather year-round.
destinations.safetyTips: Respect local customs and traditions. Be cautious of strong currents while swimming in the ocean.
